rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3120}
Must be enrolled in course version {3120, F6001}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ARC4201, OHS1000}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ARC4101, ARC4201}

description: Professional Studies 2 exposes students to the complex and evolving contexts of local and global architectural practice. The unit introduces salient issues of financial dynamics, business management and ethical practices in relation to architecture. Project-based exercises enable students to strategically position themselves within contemporary practice. The unit fosters critical engagements with and entrepreneurial approaches to architectural practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
